work_experiences.title: Developer full-stack
work_experiences.description: It was a small start-up with three employees and allowed me to touch a little and learn a lot. Our main projects were websites for the hospitality industry and SEO improvements. We mainly used JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS and Node.js as development technologies.
